attributes.action: Suspend Vehicle MOT requirements for the duration of the the lockdown in the U.K
attributes.additional_details:
Suspend Vehicle M.O.T requirements for the duration of the lockdown in the U.K and reduce or suspend Road tax for the duration of this national emergency lockdown.
Garage's and supply chains have been ordered to close by the U.K Goverment, as a result driver's should not be penalised for their vehicles M.O.T expiring for the duration of the lockdown and allowed to continue to drive to essential destinations as specified.
Road tax should be reduced or waived as a result of limited travel.

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

Find out more and watch the Committee put questions suggested by petitioners to Government Ministers and the Deputy Chief Medical Officer: https://committees.parliament.uk/committee/326/petitions-committee/news/145767/committee-question-deputy-chief-medical-officer-and-ministers-on-coronavirus-response/
